name: 數學教學實習（二）（IB）
goals: To experience mathematics teach-ing and learning situations in con-texts of regular/bilingual/IBDP secondary schools
To advance the competences to realize teaching and learning theories in teaching practice under the consideration of real-life contexts
To flexibly implement a variety of teaching skills
To advance the competences to realize teaching and learning theories in teaching practice under the consideration of real-life contexts
syllabus:
(2 weeks) Teaching mathematics for understanding through inquiry-based and student-centered teaching approaches

(1 week) Field-observations in the practicum school

(3 weeks) Developing lesson plans for the teaching practicum & Micro-teaching for the teaching practicum

(6 weeks) Teaching practicum

(6 weeks) Presenting, discussing, evaluating, and reflecting on the teaching practicum

methodologies.note: Students will explain and discuss their ideas and teaching plans, they also have to present, discuss, evaluate, and reflect on their own and their peers’ teaching practicum
Students have to cooperate with their peers to prepare their micro teaching and teaching practicum
Students will have their teaching practicum in secondary schools
Students will have field-observations in the practicum school and writing reports
Students have to integrate technology in their teaching

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
